gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Knicks 118, Jazz 103
gameRecap.excerpt: The Knicks win their eighth consecutive game as they defeat the Jazz, 118-103. Donte DiVincenzo led the way with 33 points, five rebounds, four assists, four steals and a career-high nine 3PM for the Knicks, while Jalen Brunson added 29 points and nine assists in the victory. Collin Sexton recorded 22 points and seven assists for the Jazz in the losing effort. The Knicks improve to 31-17 on the season, while the Jazz fall to 24-25.
